title: Mid/Top Pref (Gold 5 atm) - Looking for People to Duo/Flex Ranked with
body:
Hey,

I'm just looking for chill people to play with and climb on this account.  I can pretty much play every role (pref not to play bot lane though). No toxicity and raging please.

Currently Gold 5 atm. Got Plat 4 last season.
Feel free to add me and msg me ingame.

Thanks.
